channel.title: [PI] Making Custom Ranks? [PI]
channel.description: I am using a [PI] iHybrid source and I want to make a custom rank for playerRights == 5. With this rank i would like no crown. And I was also wondering how to make a new boolbean in Config.java so instead of "public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = false; //can admins trade? public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = false; // can admins sell items? public static final boolean ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = false; // can admin drop items?" I would like it to be public static final boolean ELITEDONOR_CAN_TRADE = false; //can admins trade? public static final boolean ELITEDONOR_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = false; // can admins sell items? public static final boolean ELITEDONOR_DROP_ITEMS = false; // can admin drop items? I have higly edited this source to be economy friendly aswell but i am still new to coding. Could someone please help me?

item.title: [PI] Making Custom Ranks? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Any other ideas? Please help me. I really need help!

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Making Custom Ranks? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bob3 Mr. Bob
item.description:
@Mr_Bob3 wrote:

What you could do to resolve this problem quickly and easily:

After you’ve made your boolean (for the rank) on login check if that user’s player rights value is aforementioned of 5, and if so set that boolean you’ve created to true.

What you can do to resolve this problem and make your ranking system better overall:

You will only be able to do this with intermediate Java knowledge!

Create an enumeration (enum) that encapsulates the data for ranks.

You also essentially should change the way your rights are stored for the temporary client (connected player) and the way rights are saved/loaded.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Making Custom Ranks? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I am using a [PI] iHybrid source and I want to make a custom rank for playerRights == 5. With this rank i would like no crown. And I was also wondering how to make a new boolbean in Config.java so instead of
“public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = false; //can admins trade?
public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = false; // can admins sell items?
public static final boolean ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = false; // can admin drop items?”
I would like it to be public static final boolean ELITEDONOR_CAN_TRADE = false; //can admins trade?
public static final boolean ELITEDONOR_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = false; // can admins sell items?
public static final boolean ELITEDONOR_DROP_ITEMS = false; // can admin drop items?
I have higly edited this source to be economy friendly aswell but i am still new to coding. Could someone please help me?

Read full topic
